commit.message:
Correct the precedence relation.

2011-01-25  Sebastian Pop  <sebastian.pop@amd.com>

	* graphite-dependences.c (build_pairwise_scheduling): Correctly compute
	the "a followed by b" relation and document it.

From-SVN: r169204
